The following is a list of flags of Kosovo[a].

Contents

  • 1 Republic of Kosovo
    • 1.1 State flag
    • 1.2 Government flags
  • 2 Historical Flags
    • 2.1 Flags of Kosovo under UN administration
    • 2.2 Ethnic minority flags during SFR Yugoslavia
  • 3 Flag proposals
  • 4 See also
  • 5 Notes and references

Republic of Kosovo[edit]

State flag[edit]

Flag Date Use Description
2008–Present State flag Blue with six white stars in an arc above a gold-colored map of Kosovo in the center. Dimensions: 5:7

Government flags[edit]

Flag Date Use Description
1999–Present Flag of the Kosovo Police White with two blue stripes, and a yellow-blue emblem of the KP in the centre. Dimensions: 2:3.
2000–Present Presidential standard Flag based on Ibrahim Rugova's "Dardania" flag proposal. Dimensions: 2:3
2009–Present Flag of the Kosovo Security Force Red field, with the KSF emblem featuring an eagle and six stars. Dimensions: 2:3.

Historical Flags[edit]

Flags of Kosovo under UN administration[edit]

Flag Date Use Description
1999–2008 State flag Flag of the United Nations, used for official and government purposes in Kosovo until 17 February 2008.
1999–2009 Kosovo Protection Corps Red with a black emblem of the KPC in the centre. Dimensions: 2:3.[1]

Ethnic minority flags during SFR Yugoslavia[edit]

Flag Date Use Description
c.1950–c.1990 Minority flag The flag was the official flag of the Albanian ethnic minority of Yugoslavia from the late 1940s to the late 1980s

Flag proposals[edit]

Flag Date Use Description
never used State flag "Competition Candidate 1" Dimensions: 2:3. Winning proposal and inspiration for the current flag.
never used State flag "Competition Candidate 2". Dimensions: 2:3
never used State flag "Competition Candidate 3". Dimensions: 2:3
never used State flag Rejected Competition Candidate. Dimensions: 2:3
never used State flag Joseph DioGuardi's proposal for a new Flag of Kosovo based on Albanian and USA flag. Dimensions: 2:3
never used State flag 2005 proposal for a new Flag of Kosovo based on United Nations flag and Albanian eagle. Dimensions: 2:3

See also[edit]

Wikimedia Commons has media related to Flags of Kosovo.
  • Flag of Kosovo
  • Coat of arms of Kosovo

Notes and references[edit]

Notes:

a.   ^ Kosovo is the subject of a territorial dispute between the Republic of Kosovo and the Republic of Serbia. The Republic of Kosovo unilaterally declared independence on 17 February 2008, but Serbia continues to claim it as part of its own sovereign territory. The two governments began to normalise relations in 2013, as part of the Brussels Agreement. Kosovo has received formal recognition as an independent state from 113 out of 193 United Nations member states.

References:

  1. ^ http://img107.imageshack.us/i/73493181jn8.jpg/
